description: Use with any pro-GTFS transit agency Based on GRTransit and substantially modified (supporting multiple transit agencies, with stripped-down privacy centric features), this transit app displays bus route and stop information, as well as bus times (both scheduled and actual expected times), for the Grand River Transit (GRT) system. Because of the standardization of the GTFS feed format, many transit initiatives across the country are releasing open routes in GTFS format. This app allows you to download a GTFS zip, process it, put it on your phone, and get access to the stops nearest you, even with multiple bus systems. YOU must download AND process the GTFS bus/rail schedules YOURSELF! Please refer to the README for instructions.
